## IDataStore.dataStoreGetMessage() method

Gets message from the data store

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dataStoreGetMessage(args: IDataStoreGetMessageArgs): Promise<IMessage>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                           | Description                   |
| --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------- |
| args      | [IDataStoreGetMessageArgs](./core.idatastoregetmessageargs.md) | arguments for getting message |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[IMessage](./core.imessage.md)&gt;

a promise that resolves to the message
